namespace Psr\Container;

class ContainerInterface3298038d8dc6c424bc406714db2a2290 implements ContainerInterface
{
    private $pool = null;

    public function __construct(\kuiper\swoole\pool\PoolInterface $pool)
    {
        $this->pool = $pool;
    }

    public function __call(string $method, array $args)
    {
        return \kuiper\swoole\pool\PoolHelper::call($this->pool, function($conn) use ($method, $args) {
        return $conn->$method(...$args);
        });
    }

    public function __destruct()
    {
    }

    public function get(string $id)
    {
        return \kuiper\swoole\pool\PoolHelper::call($this->pool, function($conn) use ($id) {
        return $conn->get($id);
        });
    }

    public function has(string $id) : bool
    {
        return \kuiper\swoole\pool\PoolHelper::call($this->pool, function($conn) use ($id) {
        return $conn->has($id);
        });
    }
}
